overview: Hustler exxxotica is a carnal journey to the worlds most beautiful places. The lush jungles of Bali and the remote shores of the Seychelle islands are just the scenery. Director Pierre Woodman populates these far-flung settings with gorgeous, never-before-seen talent and lets nature take its course. Atop misty mountains and beneath waterfalls, these stunning babes take pleasure to the extreme leaving no venue for satisfaction unexplored. Come with us. Hustler Exxxotica is sexual exploration at its finest.
tagline: Shot on location in the Seychelle Islands, Bali and Kauai, Hawaii.
title: Hustler Exxxotica
